sentences.en: Brazil harvested 28m bags of coffee in 1991, the biggest crop for four years.
sentences.cn: 1991年，巴西的咖啡豆产量达2,800万袋，为4年来最高。

sentences.en: Brazil has a big surplus of coffee.
Brazil has thrown up many world-famous footballers.
sentences.cn: 巴西出了许多闻名世界的足球运动员。

sentences.en: Brazil need to beat Uruguay to be certain of a place in the finals.
sentences.cn: 巴西必须击败乌拉圭才能确保进入决赛。

sentences.en: Brazil says its constitution forbids the private ownership of energy assets.
sentences.cn: 巴西称其宪法禁止个人占有能源资产。

sentences.en: Cachaca is Brazil's answer to tequila.
sentences.cn: 巴西甜酒相当于是巴西的龙舌兰酒。

sentences.en: He plucks Brazil nuts off the ground and tosses them into the basket.
sentences.cn: 他从地上抓起巴西坚果，扔到篮子里。

sentences.en: It is France versus Brazil in the final.
sentences.cn: 决赛是法国队对巴西队。

sentences.en: Journalists came from as far afield as China and Brazil.
sentences.cn: 新闻记者来自中国和巴西等远方国度.

sentences.en: Many of the plants are native to Brazil.
sentences.cn: 这些植物中有很多原产地在巴西。

sentences.en: Mr Mendes was leading a campaign to save Brazil's rainforest from exploitation.
sentences.cn: 门德斯先生正领导一场运动，以拯救遭到乱砍滥伐的巴西热带雨林。

sentences.en: Polio has been virtually eradicated in Brazil.
sentences.cn: 在巴西脊髓灰质炎实际上已经根除。

sentences.en: Portuguese is the national language of Brazil.
sentences.cn: 葡萄牙语是巴西的民族语言.

sentences.en: The case has generated enormous publicity in Brazil.
sentences.cn: 这个案件已经在巴西引起了极大的关注。

sentences.en: The city compares favourably with other parts of Brazil.
sentences.cn: 这个城市比巴西的其他地方好.

sentences.en: The constitution also confers large powers on Brazil's 25 constituent states.
sentences.cn: 宪法还赋予巴西的25个成员州很大的权力。

sentences.en: Today's football match is France versus Brazil.
sentences.cn: 今天的足球赛是法国队对巴西队。
